Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2004 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2004 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.40-2, affected by CVE-2024-2004
